article_title: Israeli army strapped wounded Palestinian to military vehicle
sentence: The  UN  says  at  least  480  Palestinians  -  members  of  armed  groups,  attackers  and  civilians  -  have  been  killed  in  conflict-related  incidents  in  the  West  Bank,  including  East  Jerusalem.

article_title: Israeli army strapped wounded Palestinian to military vehicle
sentence: Israel  accused  of  possible  war  crime  over  killing  of  West  Bank  boyTen  Israelis,  including  six  security  forces  personnel,  have  also  been  killed  in  the  West  Bank.
